summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Conquer Beauty - Dry Brushing Body Brush with Massage Nodes - Bamboo Long Handle Back Scrubber for Shower Brush with Natural Boar Bristles - Skin Care Exfoliator Reduce Cellulite Bath & Spa - 1 Piece
Review Date: 2019/07/08
Store: Conquer Beauty
Product Description: ['Do you want healthier, younger, and softer looking skin? We\'ve got the cure for you. Our dry brushing body brush is made to brush all areas of your troubled skin areas where there are noticeably uneven, blotchy, and cellulite skin areas. With everyday regular dry brushing using this body brush, your skin will appear beautiful again.  NOTE: Please to aware that our body brush bristles will appear harder than usual the first few times of use. This is normal as our brushes are brand new. Allow skin to get used to the bristles after 1-2 weeks of everyday use. INSTRUCTIONS: Hold onto body brush wooden handle to brush dry before your shower or wet during your shower or bath.Meant to be used for high pressure brushing or soft pressure brushing. Apply massage oil onto brush to loosen up pressure.Simply hang to dry after each use. For best results, brush into skin repeatedly daily. SENSATIONAL BENEFITS: Live the ultimate luxurious, at-home spa experience Exfoliate and remove unwanted dead skin Allow new skin to resurface and glow Back body scrub for hard to reach areas Improve your lymphatic system Reduce appearance of celluliteMassage sore muscle tensions Stimulate blood circulationFull body massageDIMENSIONS:15.75" (L) x 4.25" (Head Width) x 1.5" (H) inches  MATERIAL:Handle made with 100% Bamboo Wood and head is made of 100% Natural Boar Bristles.Our brand, Conquer Beauty is sold only by our company, Cnqr Productions Inc. All other sellers may be considered counterfeit.']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Conquer Beauty', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '15.75 x 4.25 x 1.5 inches', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Wash with Warm Water', 'Operation Mode': 'Manual', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '15.75 x 4.25 x 1.5 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '601754997006', 'Manufacturer': 'Conquer Beauty'}
Review Text: Love everything about it,not to hard or to soft
Review Title: Really durable
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===

Review Date: 2019/11/05
Store: sunvito
Average Rating: 1.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 4.13 x 1.54 inches; 4.32 Ounces'}
Review Text: Trash!! Came like it was already used and with a broken head
Review Title: Trash
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: [Upgrade] FUGACAL Hair Straightener Brush, 30s Fast Heating, 3 Temp Settings, Anti-Scald Design and 30mins Auto-Off, Bring You Ultra Straight Hair with Natural Shiny Look in Minutes
Review Date: 2022/04/20
Store: Fugacal
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Fugacal', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Hair Type': 'Thick', 'Product Dimensions': '12.2 x 1.8 x 1.7 inches; 1.79 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'FG-HS01', 'Manufacturer': 'Fugacal'}
Review Text: First time trying a straightener with steam. So far i like it left my hair manageable, not to flat maybe i need more heat,and it was a little puffy next day. Not perfect but worked fine for me.
Review Title: Hair straightener
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ForPro Expert Therapy Massage Lotion, Fragrance-Free, Relax Sore Muscles & Repair Dry Skin, Lightweight, Non-Greasy Formula, Paraben & Sulfate-Free, 1 Gallon (128 Ounces)
Review Date: 2022/04/24
Store: ForPro Professional Collection
Product Description: ['ForPro Expert Therapy Massage Lotion is specifically made using an expert formulation that contains arnica extract and aloe for soothing sore muscles; shea butter and olive oil for providing maximum glide; cocoa butter, vitamin E, sweet almond and avocado oil for deep penetrating moisturization. Massage lotion hydrates without leaving a greasy feel to optimize any massage, repairs dry skin, relieves sore muscles, and increases blood circulation throughout the body. Quick absorption provides lasting performance and drag and superior workability. Suitable for all massage types, including Swedish, Deep Tissue, and Sports. Residue-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free, and fragrance-free. 100% vegan.']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ForPro Professional Collection', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Allergen Information': 'Almonds', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 6 x 10 inches; 8 Pounds', 'UPC': '672047908832', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/TNGAE'}
Review Text: Fragrance free perfect for any skin type especially sensitive skin. I use it daily for back and leg massage.
Review Title: Massage lotion
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: facetheory Ocuwake Eye Cream EYE1 - Eye Cream For Dark Circles And Puffiness, Vitamin C Eye Brightening Cream, Vegan and Cruelty-Free, Made in the UK | Unfragranced | 1.0 fl oz
Review Date: 2022/06/05
Store: facetheory
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Facetheory', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Chamomile,glyceryl stearate,tocopherol,vitamin c', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.47 x 1.26 x 1.14 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'EYE-1-V2', 'Manufacturer': 'facetheory', 'Country of Origin': 'United Kingdom'}
Review Text: No more dark circles around the eyes. Use it everyday and you will see a small difference. Small is better than nothing at all.
Review Title: Good eye cream
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eyebrow Stamp, Eyebrow Stamp Shaping Kit, Eyebrow Stamp Stencils Kit, Waterproof,Long Lasting, Eyebrow Makeup Powder Kit, Eyebrow Definer for Women (Black)
Review Date: 2022/06/07
Store: ALIVER
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ALIVER', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 2.2 x 1 inches; 1.59 Ounces'}
Review Text: I still haven't learned to shape my brows.  This is prefect. Select your shape hold it against your brows and fill in. I love it!
Review Title: Beautiful eyebrows
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hygieia + Encapsulated 2% Retinol Cream – Liposomal Anti-Wrinkle Cream for Face, Neck & Body – Fast & Deep Cellular Absorption – Day or Night Cream for Firming, Lifting & Repairing Aging Skin, 4oz
Review Date: 2022/09/25
Store: Hygieia +
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Hygieia +', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Retinol', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '3.03 x 2.87 x 2.32 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '607469295352', 'Manufacturer': 'Hygieia +'}
Review Text: Smooth cream easy to apply. Maybe I'll see the retinol results in 20 years 🤔 😂,as of now it's just a nice moisturizer to me. But come on now that price for the size.  Crazyyyyyy
Review Title: Smooth
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

    Structure your response as:
   
    SUMMARY:
    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual displays a strong inclination towards personal care and skincare products, often favoring options that promote skin health, hydration, and overall wellness. Consistent positive ratings indicate a preference for quality items, particularly those that are gentle and effective, marked by frequent mentions of durability, manageability, and softness. 

Common themes reveal an interest in multifunctional products, such as those aimed at exfoliation, relaxation, and hair grooming, with particular attention to ease of use and comfort. Additionally, the buyer tends to favor unscented or fragrance-free formulations, indicating sensitivity or preference for minimalistic products that accommodate sensitive skin. 

Quality is deemed more important than price, as shown by the willingness to invest in higher-rated products despite expressing concern about costs; the negative experience with a defective item illustrates a lower tolerance for poor quality. The person also values feedback on performance, as seen in their responses related to effectiveness over time. 

Overall, core preferences encompass a focus on skincare and wellness that emphasizes quality, multifunctionality, gentleness, and a positive sensory experience, while also exhibiting some price consciousness when quality is perceived to suffer.

target_interaction.title: Light weight
target_interaction.text: Super light weight moisturizer,feels so soft and light on my skin. Pair better with beautylux serum
target_interaction.title_meta: BeautyLux Face Moisturizer Hydrating with Aloe, Chamomile and Hyaluronic Acid 2 oz. (57g)
